search.title: Search & Discovery
search.resultsPerPageDesc: Set the number of items to load for each page of search results.
search.showExplorerHubDesc: Display curated content like 'Trending' on the main Explore page when the search bar is empty.
search.defaultSortDesc: Choose the default sorting order for new searches in the main explorer view.
search.rememberFiltersDesc: Preserve your last-used media type and year range filters from the Explorer page across sessions.
search.rememberSortDesc: Preserve your last-used sort criteria in the Uploader and My Archive views across sessions.

ui.title: User Interface
ui.layoutDensityDesc: Adjust the spacing and size of items in grids and lists for a more or less compact view.
ui.accentColorDesc: Customize the primary color used for highlights, links, and active elements across the app.
ui.scrollbarColorDesc: Customize the color of the scrollbar thumb to match your preference.
ui.themeDesc: Choose how the application looks. 'System' will automatically match your operating system's setting.
ui.languageDesc: Select the display language for the entire user interface.

accessibility.title: Accessibility
accessibility.highContrastDesc: Increases text and UI element contrast for improved visibility and readability.
accessibility.underlineLinksDesc: Makes all hyperlinks underlined by default to make them more distinct from regular text.
accessibility.fontSizeDesc: Adjust the global font size throughout the application for better readability.
accessibility.disableAnimationsDesc: Disables most animations and transitions for a simpler, more direct experience.

content.title: Content & Hubs
content.defaultViewDesc: Choose which page to display when you first open the application.
content.defaultUploaderDetailTabDesc: Select the tab that is opened by default when viewing a contributor's profile.
content.autoplayMediaDesc: Automatically start playing audio previews when opening an item's detail view.
content.defaultDetailTabAllDesc: Select the default tab to show when opening any item's detail view.
content.openLinksInNewTabDesc: Ensures all links to archive.org or other external sites open in a new browser tab.

ai.title: AI Features
ai.enableAiFeaturesDesc: Globally enable or disable all features powered by the Gemini AI, such as summarization and entity analysis.
ai.autoArchiveAIDesc: Automatically save all your AI-generated content to the AI Archive for future reference.
ai.defaultAiTabDesc: Choose whether to see the standard description or the AI tools first when opening a text-based item.
ai.autoRunEntityExtractionDesc: Automatically perform entity analysis when you open a text document in the Scriptorium or detail view.
ai.summaryToneDesc: Set the stylistic tone for AI-generated summaries to better suit your needs.

data.exportAllDesc: Download a complete backup of your settings, library items, and worksets as a single JSON file.
data.importAllDesc: Restore your app data from a previously exported JSON file. This will overwrite all existing data.
data.importConfirm: Are you sure you want to import this data? All current settings and saved items will be overwritten.
data.importSuccess: Data imported successfully! The page will now reload.
data.title: Your Data
data.clearHistoryDesc: Clear your locally stored search history from the command palette.
data.resetAllDesc: This will reset all application settings to their defaults. Your library and worksets will NOT be affected.
data.dangerZoneDesc: These actions are permanent and cannot be undone.
data.clearLibraryDesc: Permanently delete all of your saved library items, custom collections, and followed contributors.
data.clearScriptoriumDesc: Permanently delete all of your Scriptorium worksets and associated notes.
data.clearAIArchiveDesc: Permanently delete all of your saved AI generations from the AI Archive.
